name: PubMed_search_articles
description: Search PubMed using NCBI E-utilities (esearch + esummary) and return articles. Returns articles with title, journal, year, DOI, and PubMed URL.

query.description: Search query for PubMed articles. Use keywords separated by spaces to refine your search.

limit.description: Number of articles to return. This sets the maximum number of articles retrieved from PubMed.

api_key.description: Optional NCBI API key for higher rate limits. Get your free key at https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/account/

return_schema.description: List of PubMed articles matching the search query

journal.description: Journal name where the article was published

url.description: URL to the article on PubMed
